### Welcome!

Welcome to my personal website! Currently, I am an Assistant Professor in the [Department of Biostatistics](https://sph.unc.edu/bios/biostatistics/) at the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill.

Previously, I was Instructor of Medicine in the [Divisision of Pharmacoepidemiology and Pharmacoeconomics](https://www.drugepi.org) at Harvard Medical School.

### Departmental Profile

My departmental profile is available [here](https://sph.unc.edu/adv_profile/ethan-alt-phd/), but this website will contain the most up-to-date information.

### About this website

On this website, you can find my CV, software, and presentations. I may eventually add a blog.
